about_the_game:
The game for the flash company released a vampire, werewolf and human tripartite werewolf killing type of game, the game uses an asymmetric competitive mode, in the TPS perspective for tense and exciting confrontation. Developed by UE5 engine, the picture is real and abnormal stimulation.
In the game, you can choose to start the game, perform a normal match or enter a ranking match, when you enter the game, you will be with 31 other (a maximum of 32 players in a game) are assigned a random identity (werewolf, vampire or human), as a human you need to collect three symbols of identity crystal stones, In order to remove the curse of werewolves and kill vampires to win the game, as a werewolf, you need to assist and protect humans to successfully obtain the crystal stone to remove their curse, as a vampire, you need to kill all werewolves, suck the blood of humans or transform them into vampires to expand the camp of vampires.
Be careful of anyone who approaches you or pretends to assist you in the game, they are likely to be other camp identities, if unfortunately cheated, you can only be forced to switch sides or start the next game, each identity has its own unique winning mechanism, the game is confusing enjoy!
